event.title: worked in the District Attorney's office for 10 years

data.event: She worked in the District Attorney's office for 10 years before becoming a defense attorney.
Conger, 62, was appointed district attorney in 1995 and first elected to it the next year.

event.title: elected to it the next year

data.event: Conger, 62, was appointed district attorney in 1995 and first elected to it the next year.
